participant_1.background:
I've never been in a fight, but I'm not afraid to stand up for myself.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I like to spend my summers in warmer climates.
I lost my brother when he was in a submarine accident.
i hate the taste of cheese.

participant_2.background:
I spent a week in the Amazon Rainforest when I was younger, and it was the most amazing experience of my life.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.
I love to read and write because they're both solitary activities that allow me to focus on my own thoughts.
I have a bad back from years of standing on my feet all day.
i m not going to go the extra mile anymore.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Pretty good! I was just thinking about my favorite experiences. Do you have any favorite memories?
I have a few! One of my favorite memories is from when I was a kid. I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
That sounds like so much fun! I used to love to play in the woods as a kid too. What kind of stories did you make up?
I would make up all sorts of stories, usually about fantasy worlds or adventures. I loved coming up with new characters and exploring different worlds.
That sounds so cool! I wish I had been more creative as a kid. I usually just played with my friends and made up games.
I think it's great that you were so active! I was pretty shy as a kid, so I didn't play with friends as much as I would have liked.
I can relate to that. I was also pretty shy as a kid. I'm glad that I've become more outgoing as I've gotten older.
Me too! I think it's important to step outside of your comfort zone and try new things.
I agree! I'm always looking for new ways to challenge myself.
That's awesome! I think it's important to keep growing and learning new things.
